languages.text: {n}В облике шагающего вам навстречу мужчины, в каждом его жесте, в манере держаться читается благородное происхождение. Тем страннее выглядят его волосы — сплошной колтун, который явно не видел расчески неделями, и одежда, мятая и грязная. Лицо его бледно, глаза лихорадочно горят.{/n} "Кто вы? Я ждал моего друга Эвейна, а не чужаков".

{n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."
languages.original_text: {n}В облике шагающего вам навстречу мужчины, в каждом его жесте, в манере держаться читается благородное происхождение. Тем страннее выглядят его волосы — сплошной колтун, который явно не видел расчески неделями, и одежда, мятая и грязная. Лицо его бледно, глаза лихорадочно горят.{/n} "Кто вы? Я ждал моего друга Эвейна, а не чужаков".

traits.locale_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, in his every gesture and demeanour, speaks of his highborn descent. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that must have remained unbrushed for weeks — and his clothing, crumpled and filthy. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

{n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, in his every gesture and demeanour, speaks of his highborn descent. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that must have remained unbrushed for weeks — and his clothing, crumpled and filthy. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

{n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

{n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

{n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

languages.text: {n}一个男人朝你走来，他外表的每处细节、每个手势与举止，都说明他出身于贵族阶层。然而，这一切都与他的头发形成了鲜明的对比。他的头发到处都打着死结，很显然已经几个星期没梳洗过了。他的衣服也已经脏污，变得皱巴巴的。他脸色苍白，双眼中燃烧着疯狂的火焰。{/n}“你是什么人？我在等我的朋友艾维尼，没在等入侵者。”
languages.original_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}一个男人朝你走来，他外表的每处细节、每个手势与举止，都说明他出身于贵族阶层。然而，这一切都与他的头发形成了鲜明的对比。他的头发到处都打着死结，很显然已经几个星期没梳洗过了。他的衣服也已经脏污，变得皱巴巴的。他脸色苍白，双眼中燃烧着疯狂的火焰。{/n}“你是什么人？我在等我的朋友艾维尼，没在等入侵者。”

languages.text: {n}こちらに向かって歩いてくる男の姿、仕草、態度、すべてが高貴な生まれであることを物語っている。それは、明らかに何週間もブラシをかけていないもつれた髪や、しわくちゃで汚れた衣服と際立ったコントラストを生み出していた。彼の顔色は悪く、目は熱を帯びている。 {/n}「お前は誰だ？私は侵入者ではなく、友人のエヴァインを待っていたのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}歩いてくる男の姿、その仕草、態度、すべてが高貴な生まれであることを物語っている。それが、明らかに何週間もブラシをかけていない髪や、しわくちゃで不潔な衣服とは対照的なものとなっている。その顔色は悪く、目は熱を帯びている。 {/n}「お前は誰だ？私は友人のエヴァインを待っていたのだ。侵入者ではなくな」
{n}こちらに向かって歩いてくる男の姿、仕草、態度、すべてが高貴な生まれであることを物語っている。それは、明らかに何週間もブラシをかけていないもつれた髪や、しわくちゃで汚れた衣服と際立ったコントラストを生み出していた。彼の顔色は悪く、目は熱を帯びている。 {/n}「お前は誰だ？私は侵入者ではなく、友人のエヴァインを待っていたのだ」

languages.text: {n}Die gesamte Erscheinung des Mannes, der auf dich zugeht, jede Geste, das ganze Auftreten, alles weist auf seine adlige Abstimmung hin. Einen starken Kontrast dazu bilden seine Haare – eine verfilzte Matte, die seit Wochen keine Bürste gesehen hat – und seine zerknitterte und schmutzige Kleidung. Sein Gesicht ist blass, und seine Augen leuchten fieberhaft.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr? Ich habe meinen Freund Evayne erwartet, keinen Eindringling."
languages.original_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

Einen starken Kontrast dazu bilden seine Haare – eine verfilzte Matte, die seit Wochen keine Bürste gesehen hat – und seine zerknitterte und schmutzige Kleidung. Sein Gesicht ist blass, und seine Augen leuchten fieberhaft.{/n} "Wer seid Ihr? Ich habe meinen Freund Evayne erwartet, keinen Eindringling."

languages.text: {n}Tout dans l'apparence de l'homme qui s'avance vers vous, de ses moindres gestes à son attitude, laisse à penser qu'il est de noble naissance. Le contraste est d'autant plus saisissant avec ses cheveux, une touffe emmêlée qui n'a manifestement pas été brossée depuis des semaines, et ses vêtements sales et froissés. Son visage est pâle, et ses yeux sont brillants de fièvre.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous ? J'attendais la visite de mon ami Evayne, pas une invasion. »
languages.original_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tout dans l'apparence de l'homme qui s'avance vers vous, de ses moindres gestes à son attitude, laisse à penser qu'il est de noble naissance. Le contraste est d'autant plus saisissant avec ses cheveux, une touffe emmêlée qui n'a manifestement pas été brossée depuis des semaines, et ses vêtements sales et froissés. Son visage est pâle, et ses yeux sont brillants de fièvre.{/n} « Qui êtes-vous ? J'attendais la visite de mon ami Evayne, pas une invasion. »

languages.text: {n}La apariencia al completo del hombre que camina hacia ti, desde sus gestos hasta su actitud, te informa de sus orígenes nobles. Eso crea un fuerte contraste con su pelo, un nudo apelmazado que no ha conocido peine en semanas, y su ropa arrugada y sucia. Su cara está pálida y sus ojos presentan un brillo febril.{/n} «¿Quién eres? Esperaba a mi amigo Evayne, no a unos intrusos».
languages.original_text: {n}Everything in the appearance of the man walking toward you, his every gesture and his very demeanour, speaks of his noble birth. This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."

traits.locale_text: {n}La apariencia al completo del hombre que camina hacia ti, desde sus gestos hasta su actitud, te informa de sus orígenes nobles. Eso crea un fuerte contraste con su pelo, un nudo apelmazado que no ha conocido peine en semanas, y su ropa arrugada y sucia. Su cara está pálida y sus ojos presentan un brillo febril.{/n} «¿Quién eres? Esperaba a mi amigo Evayne, no a unos intrusos».

languages.text: {n}Sana doğru yürüyen adamın görünüşündeki her şey, her hareketi ve tavrı, soylu bir aileden geldiğini gösteriyor. Bu durum, haftalardır tarak görmediği belli olan, keçeleşip birbirine dolanmış saçları ve buruşuk, pis giysileriyle tam bir tezat oluşturuyor. Yüzü solgun, gözleriyse hararetle yanıyor.{/n} "Sen de kimsin? Arkadaşım Evayne'i bekliyordum, davetsiz bir misafiri değil."

This creates a stark contrast with his hair — a matted knot that clearly has not seen a brush in weeks — and his crumpled and filthy clothing. His face is pale, and his eyes burn feverishly.{/n} "Who are you? I was expecting my friend Evayne, not an intrusion."
